summary: A young princess is the subject of a tug-of-war among witches, as each struggles to find the suitable antidote to a death sentence inculcated by an evil sister.
cast: Carla Besnaïnou|Julia Artamonov|Kerian Mayan|David Chausse|Luna Charpentier|Rhizlaine El Cohen|Delia Bouglione-Romanès|Diana Rudychenko|Maricha Lopoukhine|Jean-Philippe Tesse|Dounia Sichov|Leslie Lipkins|Camille Chalons|Romane Portail|Anne-Lise Kedvès|Rosine Favey|Dominique Hulin|Paul Vernet|Laurine David|Pierre Estorges|Marie Piton|Mayssa Olabi|Olga Abrego|Moanna Ferré|Daniéle Nicolle|Paul Magnard|Sara Bentot|Julie Tauzin|Olivier Brandicourt|Odile Mallet
title: La belle endormie
